languages.text: "Вы добры душой, но совершенно не ладите с людьми. Я обучу вас искусству общения, если пожелаете".

traits.locale_text: "Вы добры душой, но совершенно не ладите с людьми. Я обучу вас искусству общения, если пожелаете".

languages.text: "You have a kind soul but have difficulty reaching out to people. I could teach you the art of communication, if you like."
languages.original_text: "Вы добры душой, но совершенно не ладите с людьми. Я обучу вас искусству общения, если пожелаете".

traits.locale_text: "You have a kind soul but have a difficulty reaching out to people. I could teach you the art of communication, if you like."
"You have a kind soul but have a difficulty reaching out to people. I could teach you the art of communication, if you like."
"You have a kind soul but have difficulty reaching out to people. I could teach you the art of communication, if you like."
"You have a kind soul but have difficulty reaching out to people. I could teach you the art of communication, if you like."
"You have a kind soul but have difficulty reaching out to people. I could teach you the art of communication, if you like."

languages.text: “你拥有善良的灵魂，但你并不擅长与别人打交道。如果你愿意的话，我可以教导你沟通的艺术。”
languages.original_text: "You have a kind soul but have difficulty reaching out to people. I could teach you the art of communication, if you like."

traits.locale_text: “你拥有善良的灵魂，但你并不擅长与别人打交道。如果你愿意的话，我可以教导你沟通的艺术。”

languages.text: «Su alma es amable, pero le cuesta tratar con la gente. Si le interesa, podría enseñarle el arte de la comunicación».
languages.original_text: "You have a kind soul but have difficulty reaching out to people. I could teach you the art of communication, if you like."

traits.locale_text: «Su alma es amable, pero le cuesta tratar con la gente. Si le interesa, podría enseñarle el arte de la comunicación».

languages.text: 「カシア殿は優しい心の持ち主だが、人と接するのが苦手なようだ。よければ、コミュニケーションの技術をお教えしようか？」
languages.original_text: "You have a kind soul but have difficulty reaching out to people. I could teach you the art of communication, if you like."

traits.locale_text: 「カシア殿は優しい心の持ち主だが、人と接するのが苦手なようだ。よければ、コミュニケーションの技術をお教えしようか？」

languages.text: "Ihr habt eine gütige Seele, könnt Euch aber nur schwer anderen nähern. Ich könnte Euch die Kunst der Kommunikation lehren, wenn Ihr es wünscht."
languages.original_text: "You have a kind soul but have difficulty reaching out to people. I could teach you the art of communication, if you like."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt eine gütige Seele, könnt Euch aber nur schwer anderen nähern. Ich könnte Euch die Kunst der Kommunikation lehren, wenn Ihr es wünscht."

languages.text: « Vous avez bon cœur, mais vous semblez avoir le plus grand mal à vous faire comprendre. Je pourrais vous enseigner l'art de la communication, si vous le souhaitez. »
languages.original_text: "You have a kind soul but have difficulty reaching out to people. I could teach you the art of communication, if you like."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez bon cœur, mais vous semblez avoir le plus grand mal à vous faire comprendre. Je pourrais vous enseigner l'art de la communication, si vous le souhaitez. »

languages.text: "Nazik bir ruha sahip olsan da insanlarla temas kurmakta zorluk yaşıyorsun. İstersen sana iletişim sanatı konusunda bazı şeyler öğretebilirim."
languages.original_text: "You have a kind soul but have difficulty reaching out to people. I could teach you the art of communication, if you like."

traits.locale_text: "Nazik bir ruha sahipsin ama insanlara temas etmekte zorluk yaşıyorsun. Sana iletişim sanatı konusunda bazı şeyler öğretebilirim istersen."
